mapper.insert: insert into "order" (ID, ORDER_STATUS_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_PHONE, CUSTOMER_COMMENT) values (NEXTVAL('order_seq'), #{orderStatusId}, #{customerName}, #{customerPhone}, #{customerComment});
mapper.select: select o.id, o.order_status_id, o.customer_name, o.customer_phone, o.customer_comment, oi.id, oi.order_id, oi.item_name from "order" as o join order_item oi on o.id = oi.order_id where o.id = #{id};
select * from "order" join order_item oi on "order".id = oi.order_id;
mapper.delete: delete from order_item where order_id = #{id}; delete from "order" where id = #{id};
